tool.name: scmap index clusters
tool.description: calculates centroids of each cell type and merges them into a single table

param.name: input_single_cell_experiment
param.label: SingleCellExperiment object
param.help: File with serialized SingleCellExperiment object as produced by 'scmap select features'

param.name: cluster_col
param.label: Cluster column
param.help: Column name in the 'colData' slot of the SingleCellExperiment object containing the cell classification information.
